attributes.action: Re-open the e-mail the PM facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its only right that the  e-mail facility is reopened for the benefit of democracy within this great nation of ours.

rejection.details: The email facility will be reintroduced shortly, once maintenance on the system is complete. For more details on how to contact the PM in the meantime, please visit: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
